revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Slowpoke Well |image = [[File:Slowpoke Well.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Slowpoke Well. |tokens = 3,500 |location = In Azalea Town. }} '''Slowpoke Well''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 67,900 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | colspan=2|<center>N/A || [[File:Rocket_Executive_(proton).png|40px]] Rocket Executive Proton || [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing || <center>320,000 |}
